post.body: I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
Yes I have 2 blogsites - haven't upgraded the older one the interface is quite different - I get confused moving between them
It depends what is in my glass!!!! Happy New Year!!
When I lived in Australia Christmas was wonderful because it was also summer - we also had a month's worth of vacation days! :-)
Wow!! I will have to look at your email and get that onto my calendar. Thanks for the reminder
I am looking forward to 'meeting' you at Group Mastery in a couple of weeks!! Happy New Year!
Aren't those the three main food groups LOL!!! Good luck!!
Thank you so much for the info I must admit that with the twins I have not made it a priority. Need to block time and focus!
Love for you to come to my house - my 3 1/2 year old is not wanting to say goodbye to her diapers yet :-( I must Just Do It!
So exciting!!! I had my twin boys in June as well - arrived only two weeks early!! They are 18 months old now - busy but fun
Love to hear any ideas that you have for reaching more????
I am taking a teleclass with you in early Jan. I am writing articles, have my website, working with RESOLVE, talking to my OB...
Wow I am getting some inspiration for tackling my daughter's eating habits. She drinks too much milk :-)
I am wondering how to post my articles with you - I am confused!!! I am already doing through ezine - should I post with u 2?
is watching the snow fall in Boston - big storm here today!! Wishing everyone a very Happy New Year - b safe - thanks for my new followers!
is home after having a couple of beers at a local Boston bar with a great girlfriend - I have been having some long days without preschool!!
is wondering what Squidoo is good for? I have looked & it seems that it is a good way to sell things but maybe not for services - comments?
is reading Influence by Robert Cialdini - recommended by those who attended @RossGoldberg event a few weeks back-a very interesting read :-)
is thinking about getting a Flip - Amazon has a good deal on them - do I need one? Be fun to video the toddlers. I take lots of photos now
is wondering how I will get through another week without preschool. We do have fun but the days are long - warm day so we r off to the park!
